SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT A.* , ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.FILE_TRGT_KEY , A.CO_CD , R.CODE_NM AS CO_NM , A.ORDRS_CLNT_CD , S.CLNT_NM AS ORDRS_CLNT_NM , A.CLNT_PJT , R4.CODE_NM AS CLNT_PJT_NM , A.ORDRS_NO , TO_CHAR(A.ORDRS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDRS_DT , A.ORDRS_DIV , R1.CODE_NM AS ORDRS_DIV_NM , A.CTRT_NM , A.CURR_CD , R2.CODE_NM AS CURR_NM , NVL(A.EXRATE, 1) AS EXRATE , NVL(A.ORDRS_AMT, 0) AS ORDRS_AMT , P.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ , P.CLMN_PLAN_DIV , R3.CODE_NM AS CLMN_PLAN_DIV_NM , P.CLMN_DIV_SEQ , TO_CHAR(NVL(P.CLMN_DIV_SEQ, 1)) || ' 차' AS CLMN_DIV_SEQ_NM , NVL(P.CLMN_RATE, 0) AS CLMN_RATE , TO_CHAR(NVL(P.CLMN_RATE, 0)) || ' %' AS CLMN_RATE_NM , NVL(P.CLMN_AMT, 0) AS CLMN_AMT , TO_CHAR(P.BILL_PBLS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BILL_PBLS_DT , TO_CHAR(P.CLMN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CLMN_DT , NVL(B.SELL_BILL_DTL_AMT, 0) AS BEF_BILL_AMT , NVL(P.CLMN_AMT, 0) - NVL(B.SELL_BILL_DTL_AMT, 0) AS MI_BILL_AMT , NVL(B.SELL_BILL_DTL_AMT, 0) AS SELL_BILL_DTL_AMT , C.SELL_DCSN_NO , NVL(C.SELL_DCSN_DTL_AMT, 0) AS SELL_DCSN_DTL_AMT , '' AS SELL_BILL_NO , 'N' AS CHK --체크여부 , 0 AS BILL_AMT --확정금액 , 'I' AS DATA_CHK , NVL(R5.CODE_RPRC,0) AS VAT_RATE FROM TB_CR02M01 AS A --수주 --수금계획 JOIN TB_CR02D01 AS P ON P.CO_CD = A.CO_CD AND P.ORDRS_NO = A.ORDRS_NO --매출확정 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT CM.FILE_TRGT_KEY , CM.CO_CD , CM.SELL_DCSN_NO , CM.ORDRS_CLNT_CD , CM.SELL_DCSN_DT , CM.CURR_CD , NVL(CM.EXRATE, 1) AS EXRATE , NVL(CM.SELL_DCSN_AMT, 0) AS SELL_DCSN_AMT , CD.ORDRS_NO , CD.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ , NVL(CD.SELL_DCSN_DTL_AMT, 0) AS SELL_DCSN_DTL_AMT FROM TB_CR03M01 AS CM --매출확정 --매출확정상세 JOIN TB_CR03D01 AS CD ON CD.CO_CD = CM.CO_CD AND CD.SELL_DCSN_NO = CM.SELL_DCSN_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND CD.SELL_BILL_NO IS NULL ) AS C ON C.CO_CD = P.CO_CD AND C.ORDRS_NO = P.ORDRS_NO AND C.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ = P.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ --매출계산서 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT BM.CO_CD , BD.ORDRS_NO , BD.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ , MAX(NVL(BM.SELL_BILL_AMT, 0)) AS SELL_BILL_AMT , SUM(NVL(BD.SELL_BILL_DTL_AMT, 0)) AS SELL_BILL_DTL_AMT FROM TB_CR04M01 AS BM --매출계산서 --매출계산서 상세 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CR04D01 AS BD ON BD.CO_CD = BM.CO_CD AND BD.SELL_BILL_NO = BM.SELL_BILL_NO GROUP BY BM.CO_CD, BD.ORDRS_NO, BD.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ ) AS B ON B.CO_CD = P.CO_CD AND B.ORDRS_NO = P.ORDRS_NO AND B.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ = P.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ --회사 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R ON R.CODE_ID = A.CO_CD --수주구분 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R1 ON R1.CODE_ID = A.ORDRS_DIV --통화단위 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R2 ON R2.CODE_ID = A.CURR_CD --수금계획구분 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R3 ON R3.CODE_ID = P.CLMN_PLAN_DIV --고객사PJT LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R4 ON R4.CODE_ID = A.CLNT_PJT --고객사 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 AS S ON S.CLNT_CD = A.ORDRS_CLNT_CD --부가세% LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R5 ON R5.CODE_ID = S.SELL_VAT_CD
WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY A.CO_CD, A.ORDRS_CLNT_CD, A.ORDRS_NO, P.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ, C.SELL_DCSN_NO ) AS A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.MI_BILL_AMT > 0 ) AS A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND A.ORDRS_CLNT_CD = #{ordrsClntCd} AND A.CURR_CD = #{currCd}

SELECT DISTINCT A.FILE_TRGT_KEY , A.CO_CD , A.SELL_BILL_NO , A.ORDRS_CLNT_CD , S.CLNT_NM AS ORDRS_CLNT_NM , TO_CHAR(A.SELL_BILL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SELL_BILL_DT , A.CURR_CD , NVL(A.EXRATE, 1) AS EXRATE , NVL(B.SELL_BILL_AMT, 0) AS SELL_BILL_AMT , NVL(B.SELL_BILL_AMT, 0) AS PRINT_AMT , NVL(A.SELL_BILL_VAT, 0) AS SELL_BILL_VAT , NVL(B.SELL_BILL_AMT, 0) + NVL(A.SELL_BILL_VAT, 0) AS PRINT_SUM_AMT , A.SELL_BILL_RMK , A.UDT_RESN , A.SELL_BILL_RMK1 , A.SELL_BILL_RMK2 , A.SELL_BILL_RMK3 , A.SELL_BILL_GOODS , A.SELL_BILL_SPEC , NVL(A.SELL_BILL_QTY, 1) AS SELL_BILL_QTY , NVL(A.SELL_BILL_PRC, 0) AS SELL_BILL_PRC , A.ETC_FIELD1 , A.ETC_FIELD2 , A.ETC_FIELD3 , A.CREAT_ID , U1.NAME AS CREAT_ID_NM , TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREAT_DTTM , A.CREAT_PGM , A.UDT_ID , U2.NAME AS UDT_ID_NM , TO_CHAR(A.UDT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UDT_DTTM , A.UDT_PGM , 'U' AS DATA_CHK FROM TB_CR04M01 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CO_CD , SELL_BILL_NO , SUM(NVL(SELL_BILL_DTL_AMT, 0)) AS SELL_BILL_AMT FROM TB_CR04D01 GROUP BY CO_CD , SELL_BILL_NO
) AS B ON B.CO_CD = A.CO_CD AND B.SELL_BILL_NO = A.SELL_BILL_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 AS S ON S.CLNT_CD = A.ORDRS_CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 AS U1 ON U1.ID = A.CREAT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 AS U2 ON U2.ID = A.UDT_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.FILE_TRGT_KEY = #{fileTrgtKey}

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT A.* , ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT B.FILE_TRGT_KEY AS FILE_TRGT_KEY , A.CO_CD AS CO_CD , R.CODE_NM AS CO_NM , O.ORDRS_CLNT_CD AS ORDRS_CLNT_CD , O.ORDRS_CLNT_NM AS ORDRS_CLNT_NM , O.CLNT_PJT AS CLNT_PJT , O.CLNT_PJT_NM AS CLNT_PJT_NM , O.ORDRS_NO AS ORDRS_NO , O.ORDRS_DT AS ORDRS_DT , O.ORDRS_DIV AS ORDRS_DIV , O.ORDRS_DIV_NM AS ORDRS_DIV_NM , O.CTRT_NM AS CTRT_NM , O.CURR_CD AS CURR_CD , O.CURR_NM AS CURR_NM , O.EXRATE AS EXRATE , O.ORDRS_AMT AS ORDRS_AMT , O.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ AS CLMN_PLAN_SEQ , O.CLMN_PLAN_DIV AS CLMN_PLAN_DIV , O.CLMN_PLAN_DIV_NM AS CLMN_PLAN_DIV_NM , O.CLMN_DIV_SEQ AS CLMN_DIV_SEQ , O.CLMN_DIV_SEQ_NM AS CLMN_DIV_SEQ_NM , O.CLMN_RATE AS CLMN_RATE , O.CLMN_RATE_NM AS CLMN_RATE_NM , O.CLMN_AMT AS CLMN_AMT , O.BILL_PBLS_DT AS BILL_PBLS_DT , O.CLMN_DT AS CLMN_DT , O.BEF_BILL_AMT AS BEF_BILL_AMT , O.MI_BILL_AMT AS MI_BILL_AMT , NVL(A.SELL_BILL_DTL_AMT, 0) AS SELL_BILL_DTL_AMT , A.SELL_BILL_NO AS SELL_BILL_NO , A.SELL_DCSN_NO AS SELL_DCSN_NO , 'N' AS CHK --체크여부 , NVL(A.SELL_BILL_DTL_AMT, 0) AS BILL_AMT --확정금액 , 'U' AS DATA_CHK , O.VAT_RATE -- 부가세율 FROM TB_CR04D01 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CR04M01 AS B ON B.CO_CD = A.CO_CD AND B.SELL_BILL_NO = A.SELL_BILL_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT A.FILE_TRGT_KEY AS FILE_TRGT_KEY , A.CO_CD AS CO_CD , A.ORDRS_CLNT_CD AS ORDRS_CLNT_CD , S.CLNT_NM AS ORDRS_CLNT_NM , A.CLNT_PJT AS CLNT_PJT , R4.CODE_NM AS CLNT_PJT_NM , A.ORDRS_NO AS ORDRS_NO , TO_CHAR(A.ORDRS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDRS_DT , A.ORDRS_DIV AS ORDRS_DIV , R1.CODE_NM AS ORDRS_DIV_NM , A.CTRT_NM AS CTRT_NM , A.CURR_CD AS CURR_CD , R2.CODE_NM AS CURR_NM , NVL(A.EXRATE, 1) AS EXRATE , NVL(A.ORDRS_AMT, 0) AS ORDRS_AMT , P.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ AS CLMN_PLAN_SEQ , P.CLMN_PLAN_DIV AS CLMN_PLAN_DIV , R3.CODE_NM AS CLMN_PLAN_DIV_NM , P.CLMN_DIV_SEQ AS CLMN_DIV_SEQ , TO_CHAR(NVL(P.CLMN_DIV_SEQ, 1)) || ' 차' AS CLMN_DIV_SEQ_NM , NVL(P.CLMN_RATE, 0) AS CLMN_RATE , TO_CHAR(NVL(P.CLMN_RATE, 0)) || ' %' AS CLMN_RATE_NM , NVL(P.CLMN_AMT, 0) AS CLMN_AMT , TO_CHAR(P.BILL_PBLS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BILL_PBLS_DT , TO_CHAR(P.CLMN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CLMN_DT , NVL(C.SELL_BILL_DTL_AMT, 0) AS BEF_BILL_AMT , NVL(P.CLMN_AMT, 0) - NVL(C.SELL_BILL_DTL_AMT, 0) AS MI_BILL_AMT , NVL(R5.CODE_RPRC,0) AS VAT_RATE FROM TB_CR02M01 AS A JOIN TB_CR02D01 AS P ON P.CO_CD = A.CO_CD AND P.ORDRS_NO = A.ORDRS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT CO_CD , ORDRS_NO , CLMN_PLAN_SEQ , SUM(NVL(SELL_BILL_DTL_AMT, 0)) AS SELL_BILL_DTL_AMT FROM TB_CR04D01 GROUP BY CO_CD, ORDRS_NO, CLMN_PLAN_SEQ ) AS C ON C.CO_CD = P.CO_CD AND C.ORDRS_NO = P.ORDRS_NO AND C.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ = P.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R1 ON R1.CODE_ID = A.ORDRS_DIV LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R2 ON R2.CODE_ID = A.CURR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R3 ON R3.CODE_ID = P.CLMN_PLAN_DIV LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R4 ON R4.CODE_ID = A.CLNT_PJT LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 AS S ON S.CLNT_CD = A.ORDRS_CLNT_CD --부가세% LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R5 ON R5.CODE_ID = S.SELL_VAT_CD WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY A.CO_CD, A.ORDRS_CLNT_CD, A.ORDRS_NO )AS O ON O.CO_CD = A.CO_CD AND O.ORDRS_NO = A.ORDRS_NO AND O.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ = A.CLMN_PLAN_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R ON R.CODE_ID = A.CO_CD WHERE 1 = 1 ) AS A WHERE 1 = 1 ) AS A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND A.SELL_BILL_NO = #{sellBillNo}

SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(SELL_BILL_NO) IS NULL THEN 'BILL'||SUBSTR(#{sellBillDt}, 3, 2)||'00001' ELSE 'BILL'||SUBSTR(#{sellBillDt}, 3, 2)||LPAD(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(SELL_BILL_NO), -5)) + 1, 5, 0) END AS MNGM_NO FROM TB_CR04M01 WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND SELL_BILL_DT LIKE SUBSTR(#{sellBillDt}, 0, 4)||'%'
